post.title: Modification: Impossible
post.body:
After several hours I have finally managed to swap out that stupid Identicon with an actual graphic and change the theme colors. I had to use a [Javascript beautifier](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GQEPcjssbkvT1BsbNKUBSo4U9U7JisBxC) just so I could read the damn files, and then of course it doesn't help when I barely know how CSS works and I have to basically use trial-and-error to figure out what color codes go to what.

---

Now that I'm "done," I don't even know if the changes have been published correctly. For all I know, it is working on my computer, but everyone else sees the standard ZeroBlog design. Can someone please comment on this post to let me know if it is working for you?

post.title: Torrents Wanted, Alive
post.body:
As you should know by now, I have a massive collection of both movies and TV shows. However, the collection is never complete. I'm always on the prowl for new content or higher quality files. Unfortunately, there are some episodes of television shows that I simply cannot find available anywhere. Please take a look, and if you have any of these episodes sitting around somewhere, please kindly upload them or reseed them and send me a message with the info on where you've put it. Thanks!

---

Note that I am only looking for 720p files, unless otherwise noted.

Impractical Jokers 2x06, 07, 08, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 16, 17, 22, 3x20
The Hunt with John Walsh 2x07, 08 (any quality), 09 (any quality)
It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia 6x13
Kyle XY 2x23 (any quality), 3x01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06, 08, 09

post.title: Blinding Fast Downloads
post.body:
I wanted to let everyone know about a tool they can use to download their torrents that in some cases will make their downloads complete insanely fast. It's a free cloud-based BitTorrent client called [Seedr](https://www.seedr.cc/?r=58221) that downloads the torrent onto a remote server, then lets you do a super fast HTTP download of the file after it completes.

---

So why is this faster than typical BitTorrent clients? Well, if anyone else has already used Seedr to download the exact same torrent, Seedr will just intelligently copy over the existing downloaded files into your account. No need for them to download all over again. This is most useful with more popular downloads, like the latest TV episodes and movies, which will then be able to zip straight from their server to your hard drive with none of the usual peer-leecher-tracker-piece-hash-etc. overhead.

From what I can tell, Seedr takes privacy seriously and doesn't save your info to give to whatever government agencies ask for it, but always practice Internet safety. At the end of the day, you are the only person you can trust, so act accordingly.

Full disclosure: I DON'T work for Seedr, they have NOT paid me anything for this review, and I am receiving NO compensation of any kind from them. They have no idea who I am or that I'm writing this. However, if you use the signup link above to create an account, both of our maximum cloud spaces will get a 250 MB increase (free accounts are limited to 2 GB of space initially, which can be increased in various ways, including referrals). I'm definitely taking advantage of this, and you should too, but this doesn't at all affect my review of the site. I am recommending it because I genuinely think it is a good service that can really speed up your downloads in a lot of cases.

Enjoy!

post.title: Movies
post.body:
If you are looking for high quality movie downloads, here is an alphabetical listing of all the movies in my collection. If the name is linked, you can just click on it to download in your favoritest BitTorrent client. If not, just [contact me](http://127.0.0.1:43110/155D5trGJuE8h1zJbR85VcVE4WzNH6S93y/?Post:1) and let me know what you need and I'll upload it and send you the magnet link.

---

post.title: Welcome to the Video Vault.
post.body:
### About the Vault
My goal is to download and store as many quality movies and TV episodes as possible before an apocalypse destroys the Internet.

Currently as of this post the collection is over 18 TB of video files on RAID 1 hard drives for redundancy. I do my best to keep the highest quality files possible (maximum 1080p).

---

My selection criteria is totally subjective and completely arbitrary. In other words, if I like the show or movie, I download it. If not, I don't. End of story. I don't take requests.
### Contact Me
That said, I have no issue reseeding or reuploading old movies, episodes, or entire seasons if I have them. You can contact me with these requests in the following ways:

* ZeroMail: [thevideovault](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/?to=thevideovault)
* BitMessage: BM-NC6CQ6AzdmEqBbckoNWcTt6YgiRLDD3w
* Ricochet: ricochet:57mfek6oew35nk5m

Make sure you follow this blog so you'll see new posts in your news feed on ZeroHello. While you're at it, subscribe to my public messages on BitMessage using the same above address so you can get updates from me, even if this blog isn't available or you don't have access to it.

Enjoy!
